title: God’s Covenant with David
summary: David wants to build a house for God, but God instead promises to build a ‘house’ for David—an everlasting dynasty. David responds in humble prayer, expressing gratitude for God's promises.

faq.question: What promise does God make to David?
faq.answer: That his descendants will rule forever, ultimately pointing to the Messiah.

faq.question: What is David’s response to God’s covenant?
faq.answer: He prays humbly, praising God’s greatness and faithfulness.
